articles.title: Honda to Buy Out LG Energy's Ohio EV Battery Plant Assets for $2.9 Billion
articles.mainIdea: Honda to Buy Out LG Energy's Ohio EV Battery Plant Assets for $2.9 Billion
articles.summary: GuruFocus.com: Honda to Buy Out LG Energy's Ohio EV Battery Plant Assets for $2.9 Billion. Deal follows EV demand slowdown in the US, with transaction set to close by end-February. Related tickers mentioned: 373220.KS, HMC, HNDAF.

articles.title: Tesla Stock Drops as U.S. Auto Regulator Probes Alleged Model 3 Door Defects
articles.mainIdea: Tesla Stock Drops as U.S. Auto Regulator Probes Alleged Model 3 Door Defects
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Tesla Stock Drops as U.S. Auto Regulator Probes Alleged Model 3 Door Defects. The U.S. auto safety regulator has opened an investigation into the mechanical door release on the 2022 Tesla Model 3. The probe, launched Tuesday by the Office of Defects Investigation at the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, or NHTSA, covers an estimated 179,071 vehicles. Tesla didn’t immediately respond to Barron’s request for comment. Related tickers mentioned: HMC, HNDAF, TSLA.

articles.title: ChargePoint CEO: We expect a 'pullback' this quarter after EV tax credit expiry
articles.mainIdea: ChargePoint CEO: We expect a 'pullback' this quarter after EV tax credit expiry
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance: ChargePoint CEO: We expect a 'pullback' this quarter after EV tax credit expiry. ChargePoint, the largest US charging network with 70,000 ports nationwide, saw a bump in installations before the expiration of the tax credit. What happens next? Related tickers mentioned: ABNB, CHPT, TSLA.
